name: Tooth Protector
description:
in a day where almost all humans eat candy,  humans now needs a protector, a Tooth Protector.

You play as ColdFence the new tooth protector, you have to destroy 99% of germs on a human mouth, Because of all the candy humans eat, now the germs have evolved.

Controls

A and D - Move Left and Right

S - Pickup stuff

J - Jump

K - Attack

L - Special move
